com.google.template.soy.internal.i18n

Class BidiGlobalDir

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.template.soy.internal.i18n.BidiGlobalDir

  • public final class BidiGlobalDir
extends Object
    Bidi global direction, which is either a "static" integer value (ltr=1, rtl=-1), or a code snippet yielding such a value when evaluated at template runtime.

    Important: Do not use outside of Soy code (treat as superpackage-private).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static BidiGlobalDir LTR 
      static BidiGlobalDir RTL

      static BidiGlobalDir forIsRtlCodeSnippet(String isRtlCodeSnippet, SoyBackendKind backend)
      Creates a bidi global direction that can only be determined at template runtime, by evaluating a given source code snippet that yields a boolean value where true indicates rtl.

    • Field Detail

      • LTR

        public static final BidiGlobalDir LTR

    • Method Detail

      • forStaticIsRtl

        public static BidiGlobalDir forStaticIsRtl(boolean isRtl)
        Creates a "static" bidi global direction, i.e. one known at the time of the call, given a boolean value where true indicates rtl.
        Parameters:
        isRtl - Whether the global direction value is rtl. Otherwise, it is ltr.

      • forStaticLocale

        public static BidiGlobalDir forStaticLocale(@Nullable
                                            String localeString)
        Creates a "static" bidi global direction, i.e. one known at the time of the call, based on a locale string. A null locale indicates ltr.
        Parameters:
        localeString - A BCP 47 locale string. If null, indicates ltr.

      • forIsRtlCodeSnippet

        public static BidiGlobalDir forIsRtlCodeSnippet(String isRtlCodeSnippet,
                                                SoyBackendKind backend)
        Creates a bidi global direction that can only be determined at template runtime, by evaluating a given source code snippet that yields a boolean value where true indicates rtl.
        Parameters:
        isRtlCodeSnippet - A code snippet that will evaluate at template runtime to a boolean value indicating whether the bidi global direction is rtl.
        backend - The current backend target.

      • isStaticValue

        public boolean isStaticValue()
        Returns whether the bidi global direction is "static", i.e. is available now via getStaticValue(), as opposed to having to be determined at template runtime by evaluating the code returned by getCodeSnippet().

      • getStaticValue

        public int getStaticValue()
        The "static" bidi global direction, as an integer: ltr=1, rtl=-1. If the bidi global direction is non-static, then calling this method will produce an exception.

      • getCodeSnippet

        public String getCodeSnippet()
        A source code snippet that evaluates at template runtime to the bidi global direction, i.e. one of the integer values 1 (ltr), 0 (unknown), and -1 (rtl). When the bidi global direction is static, returns a string representing an integer literal, e.g. "1". Thus, should never be null or empty.
